item.title: Suspension of the COVID-19 regulations
item.author: kontakt@eigenbaukombinat.de (EBK Impressum)
item.description: Currently there are no COVID regulations at the Eigenbaukombinat.

item.title: adapting the behavioral rules UPDATE 28.03.2022
item.author: kontakt@eigenbaukombinat.de (EBK Impressum)
item.description: Because of the still active pandemic, we have developed a rule. Please stop it!

item.title: remote chaos in Eigenbaukombinat
item.author: kontakt@eigenbaukombinat.de (EBK Impressum)
item.description: before approx. 2 years, between christmas and new year 2019, a larger crowd from the surrounding area of the Eigenbaukombinat and Chaostreff halle with all kinds of stickers, technology, and stage nequipment on the way into the Messe leipzig to design a large assembly with stage, bar and workshops together with many other hackers from the chaoszone. as in 2020, the “chaos communication congress,” the annual conference of the chaos computer club was cancelled again in 2021 due to coronary conditions.

item.title: Impressum
item.author: kontakt@eigenbaukombinat.de (EBK Impressum)
item.description: Eigenbaukombinat Halle e.V. Landsberger Straße 3 06112 Halle Kontakt represented by the individual representatives of the Board: Danilo Arlt Uwe Flaig Tania Flaig Stephanie Teitge inscription as above kontakt@eigenbaukombinat.de Bylaws (“Satzung”) (April 2022) Scale of contributions (“Beitragsordnung”) (Januar 2024) Vereinsregister: Amtsgericht Stendal, VR 3085

item.title: directions
item.author: kontakt@eigenbaukombinat.de (EBK Impressum)
item.description: the Eigenbaukombinat is located in the Eigenbaukombinat Halle e.V. Landsberger Straße 3 06112 Halle (Saale) (OpenStreetMap-Link) which is a side road of the delitzscher road, and a parallel road to the freiimfelder road. close by is the tram stop “freiimfelder Straße”. the building you recognize in the colorful image: our rooms are not barrier-free. if treppensteig is a problem for you contact us before you visit us for the first time.

item.title: opening
item.author: kontakt@eigenbaukombinat.de (EBK Impressum)

item.title: about us
item.author: kontakt@eigenbaukombinat.de (EBK Impressum)
item.description: the Eigenbaukombinat in halle (saale) is a co-workshop - also known as open workshop. that is to say that we operate as a unit equipped with tools and machines, which can be used equally by each member. on this web page we inform about our workshop, projects of our members and our for all open organizations. if you are interested, just come by us during our opening times. If you want to get to know a lot of members at once, then the knowledge and cooking evening is a perfect starting point.

item.title: join us
item.author: kontakt@eigenbaukombinat.de (EBK Impressum)
item.description: our workshop and the exchange of the members among each other makes it possible for you to implement projects for which you have not the space, know-how or tools alone in the apartment or in the bastelkeller. You don’t have to be a pro to join us. we all started small and among our now over a hundred members find an expert for almost every thema who likes to pass on.

item.title: workshop
item.author: kontakt@eigenbaukombinat.de (EBK Impressum)
item.description: currently there are the following possibilities in the Eigenbaukombinat at about 700m²: the wooden workshop is the best equipped workshop. from the band saw to the lamello milling cutter to the decoupling saw you will find here (almost) everything you need for wood processing. for those who like it more modern, a CNC milling is available. the metal workshop offers, in addition to a flex and numerous hand tools, a CNC milling machine for aluminium as well as an MIG-MAG welding workstation, a metal band saw and a large stand drilling machine.
